name: Pixielocks Party
description:
I had a few hours and I wanted to make some 3D models so I thought, why not make a tiny party for a youtuber I like. So here it is!

If you play please play in windowed mode as it has no way to be closed from full screen without tabbing out.

Happy 18th Pixielocks!

Everything but the music By Nye Bett @clowndevs on twitter

The music can be found at www.bensound.com
